options.fig-cap: Plot of the residuals against the predicted values from a model comparing the taste ratings across yogurt vendors accounting for subject-variability.
options.fig-alt: Scatter plot of residuals against predicted values revealing a trend in the spread of the residuals.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-8

options.fig-cap: Probability plot of the residuals for the Frozen Yogurt Case Study.  If the errors follow a Normal distribution, we would expect the residuals to fall along a straight line.
options.fig-alt: Plot of the sample quantiles against the theoretical quantiles exhibiting a straight line.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-9
